"Championship Ashe Chroma & Icon"

Uh... people were told that this skin was never coming back. Is there any compensation for those who bought it under that idea? Since it was explicitly told it would not be back and here it is...

"Tokens can be used to forge event icons, a limited edition Championship Ashe loading screen border/chroma, and more."

Source: https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/worlds-hits-the-rift-2017/

And yet it isn't a limited edition chroma any more.

EDIT: To those saying they said it would come back, they also said it wouldn't: https://i.imgur.com/ZhOsCSY.png

"The icon and loading screen border will only be available this year. 2017 is also your best chance to unlock her Golden Chroma and Ward, which will become legacy content following the tournament"

They outright state in there that the Chroma will only be legacy, meaning it could return whenever Riot wants. So no. Nobody was told the skin OR chroma was never coming back; they were told the loading screen border + icon would never come back. Which they aren't; the golden chroma does not come with the border, and the icon is a different icon.

"This skin will return to the store every year during Worlds, but the icon and loading screen border will only be available this year" The icons are similar but are not the same, and there is no border. I clicked the link you provided and no where do I see them say the skin is never coming back.

They are talking about the Chroma, not the skin itself.  As the Chroma was released in 2017 and only seen then as it didn't return for the 2018 Worlds event. However, it has returned for the 2019 Worlds event (seen in the Worlds Shop with a new Golden Icon)

>"Tokens can be used to forge event icons, a limited edition Championship Ashe loading screen border/chroma, and more."

https://imgur.com/a/ltAqWcR
The border is still limited you won't get that from it.
Yes, but they said the CHROMA was also Limited Edition and now it isn't.

Yes, but considering they re-released all the others it was bound to happen eventually. They kept it limited for two years, so I didn't expect it to stay that way forever (as I have it myself from the original 2017 release)
When they release something after 2 years they have a different version of it or some other changes (see Championship Riven).
Riven was over 4 years, and was a full SKIN. This is a Chroma that just literally changes the colors upon the skin it is applied too. The 2017 version again still has the Border.

It's really frustrating that all of the Golden Championship Chromas are back this year with better looking icons than previous years, AND they cost way fewer loot tokens.

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/worlds-2017-missions-loot

2017 Championship Ashe chroma cost 320 tokens and the icon was 120 tokens. 2019  the chroma is back with a better looking icon, and the 2 combined are 300 tokens instead of 440.

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-worlds-season-2018-event

2018 Kha, Riven, Thresh, Zed, Kalista, and Shyvana chromas were all available for 400 tokens, with their icon and border bundle costing 350 each. 2019 the chromas are back with the better looking icons for only 300 tokens, albeit minus the banner. 

If players hadn't spent time and effort to get these chromas in past years we could've spent our tokens on other loot then, and gotten the 2019 chroma + icon bundles this year for way better loot prices. At minimum the 2019 chroma + icon bundle should cost fewer tokens if you already own the chroma.

They aren't really different icons though, just Golden, which is nothing new for them as they have done this for awhile.

Well they have come up with different costs over they years due to feedback, as they did cost A LOT in the past.
remember that tokens had different values back then as well, you would get more/less tokens overall depending on the event until they normalized it
Do Worlds Orbs drop Championship skins?

They drop one random Skin shard; they include Legacy Skins so they may drop Championship Skins, including Ryze!  Keep in mind that they aren't weighted for any specific kind of skin; it's one out of *literally all skins*, not just eSport skins or some other theme.
